title: ‘Don’t come back, they’ll kill you for being gay’
description: When Mohamed was caught with his boyfriend he had to flee Somaliland, where homosexuality is illegal.

title: AJ Tracey: 'There's no massive machine pushing me'
description: The rapper talks about missing live music, the Black Lives Matter movement and Tottenham's season.

title: Coronavirus: What went wrong in Scotland's care homes?
description: Why did more people die with Covid-19 in Scotland's care homes than in its hospitals?

title: Cocoa Girl: 'We made the first UK black girls' magazine'
description: Serlina Boyd created Cocoa Girl after finding nothing on the market aimed at her daughter's age group.

title: Booker Prize 2020: Hilary Mantel makes longlist
description: Thirteen novels have made the longlist, which will be whittled down to six in September.

title: Training your brain to relax on a virtual island
description: A headset that can measure your brain's reaction to images could improve mental health.

title: The assistant headteachers aiming to increase BAME representation
description: Aretha and Youlande set up Mindful Equity UK to tackle the lack of BAME teachers in leadership roles.

title: Coronavirus: Can this California prison save itself from Covid-19?
description: San Quentin is battling a devastating coronavirus outbreak that critics say could have been avoided.

title: Daisy the St Bernard dog back home after Scafell Pike mountain rescue
description: Daisy has made a full recovery after collapsing on Scafell Pike, England's highest mountain.

title: Coronavirus: 'We’re still waiting at home for them to come back'
description: Latinos represent 18% of the total US population but more than a third of Covid-19 cases.

title: Coronavirus: When I come back from Spain, will I get paid if I self-isolate?
description: The 14-day quarantine on travellers arriving from Spain has caused "uncertainty and confusion".

title: Coronavirus: Lewis Hamilton deletes vaccine conspiracy theory post
description: The Formula 1 champion has been criticised for sharing a video appearing to criticise Bill Gates.

title: Northamptonshire tornado throws up trail of debris
description: Rubbish twirling through the air is captured on video as a tornado spins through open countryside.

title: Anthony Walker: BBC drama part of his legacy, mother says
description: The TV drama tells the story of murdered Liverpool student Anthony Walker and the future he deserved.

title: Coronavirus: UK had to act 'rapidly and decisively' on Spain quarantine
description: No 10 will also keep the quarantine policy for other countries under review, a minister says.

title: Coronavirus: Pet cat found to have virus in UK
description: It is thought the animal caught the virus from its owner.

title: Coronavirus: Spain races to save tourism as cases surge
description: The UK imposed a 14-day quarantine on all arrivals from Spain after a spike in infections.

title: France to ban heated terraces in cafes and bars
description: The new ecology minister says outside heating or air conditioning is an "ecological aberration".

title: Manchester stabbing: Boy, 17, dead and four injured
description: A 17-year-old is arrested after violence erupts between two groups in Moss Side, Manchester.

title: Coronavirus in Wuhan: The son who lost his father to Covid-19
description: Zhang Hai travelled to the city with his father for routine surgery just before it went into lockdown.

title: Wiley: Anti-Semitism row prompts 48-hour Twitter boycott
description: Public figures join a protest aimed at alleged "inaction" over posts by grime music artist Wiley.

title: Firefighter abseils down well to save trapped owl
description: The rescuer had an oxygen mask and descended with ropes to save the bird.

title: Obesity: Unhealthy 'buy one get one free' deals targeted
description: Ministers will also legislate for calories to appear on menus as part of a strategy to tackle obesity.

title: Willey & Topley recalled by England for Ireland ODIs
description: Left-arm seamers David Willey and Reece Topley are named in England's 14-man squad for the three one-day internationals against Ireland.

title: Coronavirus: UK economy 'might not recover until 2024'
description: Analysts say it will take longer than expected for the economy to return to its pre-coronavirus size.

title: Ed Sheeran: 'I'd binge eat until I was sick'
description: The pop star opens up about his addictive personality, and why he's taking a break from music.

title: Rain frustrates England in victory pursuit against West Indies
description: Heavy rain delays the start of day four of the third Test between England and West Indies at Emirates Old Trafford.

title: A Suitable Boy: Critics welcome first BBC drama with all-Asian cast
description: The critics have their say on the BBC's first historical drama not to feature any white characters.

title: Coronavirus: Vietnam coma pilot warns people 'not to be blasé'
description: Scot Stephen Cameron spent more than two months in a coma in Vietnam after contracting coronavirus.

title: 'I had to work on my weaknesses, my pace, my mentality' - self-criticism a winning strategy for Norris
description: Lando Norris says his self-critical nature is behind the starring performances with which he has started the new Formula 1 season.

title: Fortnite's British teenage millionaire: One year later
description: Jaden ‘Wolfiez’ Ashman from Essex is the youngest esports player ever to win a million dollars.

title: Which defender is in the Maldini class? Find out in Garth's team of the season
description: Which defender is in the Paolo Maldini class? Find out in Garth Crooks' team of the season.

title: Coronavirus: Swimming defector was not infected, says S Korea
description: The suspected patient crawled through a drain then swam to North Korea, the South says.

title: Coronavirus doctor's diary: Will vaccine sceptics make trials a headache?
description: The NHS soon needs to start flu vaccinations and Covid vaccine trials - but anti-vax attitudes seem to be spreading.

title: Coronavirus: How bad will winter really be?
description: Could we be heading for a double whammy of flu and coronavirus?

title: Heathrow Airport brings in robots to fight coronavirus
description: The airport has installed a number of tech-based measures to help keep travellers safe.
